Text.Text: Greetings and salutations!  Please believe me when I say I am *very* grateful to you for rescuing me from a most... *painfully draining* fate!
Heya!  Thanks for saving me!
Travelers, well met and a world of praise to you!  To you I owe my life - my heart will sing your name until it beats no longer.
I'm honored by your return.  If I can be of any service to you, please let your requests fly like birds upon a gentle breeze.
Heya!
Well met again.  Is there something you would ask of me?
Thank you again.  Farewell.
Indubitably - the energy coursing throughout my body is practically leaping from me in order to engage our enemies.  I'll make short work of them.
Indeed, but I suffer from lack of rest.  I'm afraid those halfbreeds put my body through such ordeals that I can hear my bones crying out in agony.
I thought you'd never ask!  This is what I do best!
Yes, but I wish I had a weapon... oh well, to work I go!
Absolutely!  I'll rip those reptiles apart with my bare hands if I have to!
Thank you again.  Farewell.
I'm part of their grand scheme to populate the land with more halfbreeds, using seeds from the upper echelon of human intellect and... pedigree....  Should I feel... honored?
The first few times were fine, pleasurable even - the next few draining - but after *fifty* encounters in one week you begin to contemplate firing a flaming arrow into your skull!
WHAT?!
Ha-HA-ha-HA-ha-HA-ha-HA!  Not only am I free - I'm also at my peak!  Now, if you'll simply hand over all your gold and magical equipment, you just *might* live.
YOU'VE BROKEN MY CONCENTRATION!  For that I should pull your intestinal tract through your nose and hang you with it!

...Apologies... Unbeknownst to these incompetent reptiles I've planted several wizard eyes throughout this stronghold, and I can see they're mounting a large response to your intrusion.  You'd be wise to stick with me while I take their lives *and* riches.

URGH!  These dire wounds drain my strength like a starving leech in a slaughterhouse.  I suppose I should *thank* you for the destruction of the yuan-ti... though in time I would have launched a massive offensive of my own.
*sigh* Yes?  Left to our own devices, I am confident that we can both accomplish our respective goals.  What is it you need *now*?
I heard from Nheero that some of the female halfbreeds have forced you to mate with them?
You're welcome.  Go to the western portion on the next level - there you'll find a druid named Nathaniel who'll protect you.
You're welcome.  This place is unsafe - perhaps you should go.
Can you fight?
Can you fight?
You're welcome.  Farewell.
You're welcome.  Go to the western portion on the next level - there you'll find a druid named Nathaniel who'll protect you.
You're welcome.  This place is unsafe - perhaps you should go.

I'm fine.  Farewell.

Not at the moment.  Farewell.
On second thought, can you fight?
On second thought, can you fight?

On second thought, can you fight?

There's an armory in the western portion of these caves.  You might find something useful there.  Farewell.
That's good to hear.  Farewell.

On second thought, this place is unsafe - perhaps you should go.
There's an armory in the western portion of these caves.  You might find something useful there.  Farewell.
I'd like you to push on if you can.  Farewell.
Rest, and I'll check with you later.  Farewell.

Good luck.  'Til swords meet.

There's an armory in the western portion of these caves.  I'm sure you'll find a weapon there.  Farewell.

There's an armory in the western portion of these caves.  You might find something better than your hands there.  Farewell.

Forget it.
You've picked the wrong person to start a fight with.
What are you doing?
I don't appreciate being threatened.  Defend yourself!
Forgive me.  Farewell.
I heard from Nheero that some of the female halfbreeds have forced you to mate with them?
There's a druid named Nathaniel in the western portion of the next level.  Let him know what you've seen.
This place is unsafe - perhaps you should leave the yuan-ti to us and go.
